channel.title: Minority Rule 1 [Methnor and gingerbeardgentleman win!]
channel.description:
# [color=#004000]Minority Rule[/color]
[i]Welcome to Minority Rule! The rules are pretty simple. I will present you a choice of several rooms—just choose one to enter! If you pick the room with the most people, you will all meet a horrible demise![/i]
**This game is kind-of-sort-of hosted with the permission of Ddynamo, the original creator.** That being said, this should be considered a Beta test of this game.
[b][color=#0040FF]How to play?[/color][/b] Every round, you will be given a list of rooms to choose from. PM me your pick privately. if you pick the room a majority of the players pick, you will be eliminated. If there is a tie, then both rooms are considered a majority and players who picked both are eliminated. The game will end once there are two or fewer players left. Do **/Join** to join. Feel free to PM or DM each other as long as you include me.
### [color=#008080][b]POTENTIAL ROOMS:[/b][/color] [color=#800040]Betrayal [/color]- If this room is tied for the minority, it gains infinite picks and becomes the majority. Death - Everyone who picks this dies, even if it is not the majority. [color=#BFBF00]Divide [/color]- Everyone who picks this counts as half. [color=#800000][b][i]Evil [/i][/b][/color]- All pickers become cursed. [color=#FF0000]False [/color]- This room does nothing, but it takes the name of another random room. [color=#8000FF][b]Force [/b][/color]- A random person who did pick this will change to a random room in the current pool. [color=#BF0080]Gravity [/color]- A random person who did not pick this will change to this room. [color=Cornflowerblue]Holy [/color]- A random picker becomes a saint. All other pickers become cursed. [color=#800080]Illusion [/color]- This room takes the effect of another secret item before the start of the round. [color=#000040]Insanity [/color]- A random picker becomes insane. [color=#00BFFF]Life [/color]- If nobody picks this, everybody dies. [color=Lawngreen]Luck [/color]- If this room is the majority, then one random picker will survive. If this is not the majority, then one random picker will die. [color=#000080]Majority[/color] - If this room is the majority, the items with the second most votes will be the majority. [color=#FFBF40]Multiply [/color]- Everyone who picks this counts as two. [color=Sienna]Mundane [/color]- This room literally does nothing. [color=Darkred]Murder [/color]- One random picker becomes a Serial Killer [color=Gold][b]Mystery [/b][/color]- All pickers gain random statuses. [color=#000000][i]Permanency [/i][/color]- If picked by anyone, this room will also be in the pool for the next round. [color=#408080][i]Protection [/i][/color]- All pickers are immune to death this round for any reason other than the majority. A random picker becomes a bodyguard. [color=#0080FF]Purity [/color]- Everyone who picks this loses all statuses. [color=#00BF00][i]Spite [/i][/color]- A random picker will becomes cursed. [color=Steelblue][b]Secrecy[/b][/color] - All pickers become cultists.
[color=#008080][b]STATUSES:[/b][/color] [color=#408000]Bodyguard [/color]- Nobody who picks the same room as you can die for any reason other than the majority. If anyone who would die without your intervention is saved, you will die instead. [color=Steelblue][b][i]Cultist[/i][/b][/color] - If there are any cultists, then there will be an item that only its members may pick. It will be denoted in [brackets]. [color=#804080][b]Cursed[/b][/color]- You will die next round unless your status is removed or your death is prevented. This status is removed afterwards. [color=#FF0000]Healthy[/color] - You are cannot receive any statuses until this one is removed. This removes all current statuses. [b][i]Insane [/i][/b]- You must pick the majority or you will die. [color=Cornflowerblue]Saint[/color]- You are immune to death. Once your death is prevented by this status, this status will be removed. [color=#0000BF]Serial Killer[/color] - A random person who picks the same item as you will die.
### [b]Signups:[/b]
1. Simon 2. Moleland 3. Ashe 4. PolikShadowbliss 5. Insanity 6. PokemonKidRyan 7. gingerbeardgentleman 8. Methnor 9. Unknown 10. NuclearBurrito 11. Hippolytus 12. Rogue 13. Sketch 14. Strangle 15. @deafdood 16. Frostwolf103 17. Robflop
># **Winning Players:** >Methnor gingerbeardgentleman

LOL

Is this what you tried, PKR?

I was wrong, the game COULD end more poetically.

After the Spite buds conspired to get all 4 of us killed out of spite last round…

PKR tries to do the same thing, and gets himself killed in the process, because Rob ALSO tried to kill everyone out of spite.

XD

WHAT?!

why the heck would PKR choose life? what were you thinking!?

Also, Spite buds win!

I dedicate our win to Robflob, our bud who took the curse for us. he will be remembered forever.

And Orange, if you’re going to host games, at least have the decency to have no life like the rest of us. >:(

Read full topic

item.title: Minority Rule 1 [Methnor and gingerbeardgentleman win!]
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
ROUND THREE

Majority [3]- robflop, Methnor, gingerbeardgentleman
Life [1]- PokemonKidRyan

As Majority is the majority, Life becomes the “majority” and all pickers are eliminated.

Majority [3]- robflop, Methnor, gingerbeardgentleman
Life [1]- PokemonKidRyan

As he was cursed, robflop has been eliminated.

Majority [3]- robflop, Methnor, gingerbeardgentleman
Life [1]- PokemonKidRyan

This leaves only two players surviving, who both win.

Winning Players:

Methnor
gingerbeardgentleman

Good game all, and sorry for being kinda a shit host

Read full topic
